body: To which disease does the loss of CD28 expression by liver-infiltrating T cells contribute?
ideal_answer: Loss of CD28 expression by liver-infiltrating T cells contributes to pathogenesis of primary sclerosing cholangitis.
Loss of CD28 expression by liver-infiltrating T cells contributes to pathogenesis of primary sclerosing cholangitis.
loss of cd28 expression by liver-infiltrating t cells contributes to pathogenesis of primary sclerosing cholangitis.
